message: Let's start fair, I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.
That's a very generous offer Alice, but I think we can make this a bit more equitable. How about a 60/40 split?
Let's get closer. I'll take 80% and you can have 20%.
Alice, this is going nowhere. We're losing money with each round. Let's just split it 50/50 and call it a day.
